content: this pattern uses these stitches bobble- bobble stitch single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch repeat = * double_crochet- double_crochet treble_crochet- treble_crochet or triple crochet ch2 picot- chain 2 picot stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet materials needed worsted weight yarn- i used bernat super value bright yellow dark yellow and choc brown darning needle 3 5mm hook scissors
